products.description: Angus top sirloin steak full of flavor and texture. Broiled over open flame to enhance its flavors

products.name: Water
products.description: This water of volcanic origin begins its life in the south of Italy. It takes ten-years for the waters to pass slowly through the underground rock and uncontaminated depths of this source.

products.name: Pasta

products.name: Coffee
products.description: Perfectly roasted and blended beans are the most fundamental ingredient of all great coffee

products.name: Hamburger
products.description: PER I NOSTRI BURGERS USIAMO SOLO CARNE FRESCA DI FASSONA PIEMONTESE DELLA MACELLERIA OBERTO, SERVITI CON UNA MANCIATA DI PATATINE FRITTE A BARCHETTA EXTRACROCCANTI

products.name: Bread
products.description: Flatbread spread with pesto, drizzled with oil and topped with house cashew parm and our seed & spice blend

products.name: Smoked Salmon
products.description: Hot smoked salmon is fully cooked; it has a flaky consistency and tastes distinctively smoky. The fish is brined briefly in a salt solution, and then air-dried about 12 hours. Finally, it is smoked at 160°F to 180°F for several hours. Hot smoked salmon should be stored in the refrigerator and eaten within a few days.
